problem_text: Use rectangle L M N P, parallelogram L K M J to solve the problem. If m \angle P L K = 110, find m \angle L K M.
compact_text: Use rectangle LMNP, parallelogram LKMJ to solve the problem. If m \angle PLK = 110, find m \angle LKM.
annotat_text:
Use rectangle LMNP, parallelogram LKMJ to solve the problem.
If $m \angle P L K=110,$ find $m \angle L K M$
